Greatest Emperor of Gujarat

Jayasimha Siddharaja was the greatest and most powerful ruler of the Solanki dynasty. He defeated the Parmar king Yashovarman of Malwa and assumed the title 'Avantinath'. After the conquest of Junagadh, he adopted the title 'Siddhachakravarti'.

ЁЯУЪ
Hemachandracharya and Literature

He was a patron of all religions. The great Jain scholar Hemachandracharya was in his court, who wrote the grammar text 'Siddha-Hema-Shabd─Бnush─Бsan'. Jayasimha built the 'Sahasralinga Talav' (Lake of a Thousand Lingas) in Patan.
